name: Tank Project
description:
This here is Tank Project, a top down bullet hell game! Everything dies in one hit, even you. Just make sure you don't get hit and you will be fine.

Destroy all the bad guys and progress through the twenty levels of the game!

Tank Project is a solo project I made because I wanted to play Wii Tanks, but didn't have my Wii console anymore. Hope you have some fun.
